frameset.edef: to become / to take place/ to happen

example.parse: (TOP (SQ (VP (PRT (INTERROG_PART هل)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يعني) (NP-SBJ (DEM_PRON_MS ذلك)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الطريق)) (PP (PREP الى) (NP (NOUN_PROP باريس) (NOUN_NUM 2)))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS صارت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC خالية) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC كليا)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN العوائق) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN المطبات)))))))) (PUNC ?)))

arg.g: is clear of hurdles and traps?

example.parse: (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS صار) (PP-PRD (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_GEN الجميع))) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM معرفة) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الموضوع)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM معقد) (CONJ و) (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM خطير))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: to know that the issue is complicated and dangerous

example.arg: معرفة ان الموضوع معقد و خطير .
